oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Girls’ Cotillion Club, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about new members in the Girls’ Cotillion Club. The caption reads: “An attractive and popular group of girls elected to membership in the Girls’ Cotillion Club, seen at the home of the new secretary, Miss Margaret White, are, left to right: Miss Clarene Smith, Miss Ellen Bowers, Miss Marion Latta, Miss Laura Whitson, Miss Martha Beasley, Miss Virginia Sturdivant, and Miss Genevieve Baird. Other new members not present … are Miss Keith Glasgow, Miss Virginia McEwen, and Miss Esther Allen, Miss Juanita Roberts, Miss Martha Greene and Miss Margaret Greene. The new members will be presented at the spring dance to be given by the Cotillion Club at the Belle Meade Country Club.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
